title: Biden Says He Thinks Democrats Can Get ‘Pieces’ of Climate-Social Spending Bill Signed Into Law
sub_head: President Biden says invading Ukraine would be ‘disaster’ for Russia
body:
WASHINGTON— President Biden said he is optimistic that Congress will pass large chunks of his climate, education and healthcare proposal, and he warned of harsh sanctions if Russia invades Ukraine.
“I’m confident we can get pieces, big chunks of Build Back Better signed into law,” Mr. Biden said. Negotiations among Democrats over the broad legislative package stalled late last year.
